summary: The course 'DevSecOps Engineers' is a comprehensive program designed to train DevOps experts with a specialization in cyber and cloud technologies. It is the only course in Israel that integrates security aspects into the DevOps field, addressing the global trend of accelerating development processes where code is frequently deployed to production systems automatically. The program is modular, starting with a broad base of Linux administration and programming tools, followed by Python for DevOps environments, and advanced toolsets used by DevOps professionals. The course includes secure coding practices and AWS platform training, with students presenting mid-course and final presentations to prepare for job interviews. The program prepares students for three prestigious international certifications: LPIC-1, AWS Cloud Practitioner, and CCSP. It is delivered by experienced instructors and includes original content from AWS and ISC2, practical projects, and personal branding support. The course is conducted at Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, with a mix of in-person and potential online sessions.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: DevSecOps Engineers - המסלול השלם להכשרת מומחי DevOps עם התמחות בטכנולוגיות סייבר וענן.

COURSE OVERVIEW: This comprehensive program is designed to train DevSecOps experts, integrating security aspects into DevOps processes. The program addresses the growing demand for DevOps professionals, which has increased by 75% in recent years, and the skill mentions on LinkedIn have risen by 50%. The course ensures collaboration between development processes and IT technologies for efficient automation.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: The program is managed by Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University. The professional advisor is Mr. Gidi Farkash, President of the Israeli Chapter of ISC2, and Mr. Yuval Shaul, a DevOps Engineer with extensive experience in information security and cyber courses.

PREREQUISITES: The course is open to IT professionals, software testers, and programmers. Graduates in engineering and exact sciences are also eligible. An admission interview by the school's academic advisor is required, along with the ability to read and understand technical English.

CERTIFICATIONS AWARDED: The program prepares students for three prestigious international certifications: LPIC-1: Linux Administrator by LPI, AWS Cloud Practitioner by AWS, and CCSP by ISC2.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 06.01.2025
- Duration: Approximately 10 months
- Schedule: Sundays and Thursdays from 17:30 to 21:30, and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00
- Academic Hours: 350 frontal academic hours

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan
- Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, depending on university and Home Front Command guidelines.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480 ₪
- Tuition Fee: 15,800 ₪
- Includes original ISC2 study kit at no additional cost
- Graduates receive a 20% discount voucher for the AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification course.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Domain 1: Becoming DevSecOps Expert (5 Hours)
  - Introduction to DevSecOps
  - Developing a DevSecOps career
  - Building a LinkedIn profile
- Domain 2: Linux Administration and LPI LPIC-1 Exam preparation (40 Hours)
  - Shell Basics, System Administration, Network Management
- Domain 3: Git and GitHub (10 Hours)
  - Version control, Branching, GitHub/GitLab integration
- Domain 4: Bash Scripting and Programming (30 Hours)
  - Bash scripting, SQL, NoSQL databases
- Domain 5: Python Programming (60 Hours)
  - Python basics, OOP, Web development
- Domain 6: Virtualization and Containers (15 Hours)
  - Docker, Container lifecycle, Networking
- Domain 7: Kubernetes (30 Hours)
  - K8s architecture, Pod management, Helm
- Domain 8: The CI/CD Pipeline (Jenkins or GitHub CI) (25 Hours)
  - Jenkins pipelines, GitLab CI
- Domain 9: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (40 Hours)
  - AWS Cloud infrastructure, Security, Pricing models
- Domain 10: Infrastructure as a code - Terraform (15 Hours)
  - Terraform usage, Modules
- Domain 11: Monitoring and Alerting systems (25 Hours)
  - ELK Stack, Grafana, Prometheus
- Domain 12: ISC2 Cloud Security Professional - CCSP (45 Hours)
  - Cloud security, Legal, Risk and Compliance
- Domain 13: Final Projects Presentation (10 Hours)
  - Real-world scenarios, Project presentation
